title: KarmaFX - Synth Modular v1.18 32-64bit OS X [dada]
description:
KarmaFX - Synth Modular v1.18 32-64bit OS X [dada]
52.3 MB
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
http://karmafx.net
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
KarmaFX	Synth Modular is an advanced and highly flexible Simulated Analog Modular Synthesizer and Effect Unit.

Its amazing visual- and highly intuitive user interface lets you modulate just about any knob or slider by any control signal - making the soundscape possibilities almost endless.

KarmaFX Synth Modular 1.18 build 6063 changelog.

Added MS20 multimode Filter (Korg MS20 emulation), LP and HP, with 2 and 4 pole modes, saturation and drive.
Added EQ3, 3 band equalizer with adjustable crossover frequencies, and 2 and 4 pole modes.
Added PanSpread stereo expander with individual low and high spread + crossover frequency adjustment.
Added Maximizer module. Sonic Maximizer emulation with Low Contour, Process and Peak Detector.
Added Warmer waveshaper to distortion types.
Added new "Stash" bank by KarmaFX, with lead, bass and pad sounds + some fx and kicks.
Added "XenosSoundWorks" bank to installer (except for one patch using a very large sample).
Bugfix: Start / Stop play in host would not reset generators / modulators on Mac. Fixed. (Thanks Niels)
Bugfix: Turning knobs on control panel would not record automation in some hosts. Fixed.
Bugfix: Sampler GUI sometimes made the synth crash. Fixed.
Bugfix: Note bars in pattern module could show different heights for the same note. Fixed.
Bugfix: Right click and drag in step and pattern module would sometimes choose the wrong bar. Fixed.
Bugfix: Ctrl connecting wire to a knob did not work if it had previously been covered by a dropdown. Fixed.
Bugfix: Dragging mouse on Windows/PC could make GUI stop updating due to excessive paint calls. Fixed. Throttled GUI framerate to max 60Hz.
Bugfix: Frequency snap info was missing in Pad module GUI. Fixed.
Bugfix: CPU detection was disabled in v1.17. Fixed.
Pending: To get this update out fast, the manual has not been updated in this version.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Install and Enjoy!
